long_description: The REI Compact Travel adapter kit includes the 4 most commonly used international adapter plugs inside a convenient travel pouch. They'll adapt your plug but they don't convert the electricity. For use in most parts of Europe, Asia, North America, Russia, New Zealand, Africa and the Middle East. Includes ungrounded adapters covering plug-in types : A,B,C,E,F,G,H,I,J,K,L. Please note: adapter plugs allow travel appliances to fit into foreign outlets; they do not convert electricity.
short_description: The REI Compact Travel adapter kit includes the 4 most commonly used international adapter plugs inside a convenient travel pouch. They'll adapt your plug but they don't convert the electricity.
